transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Sir, awaz aa rahi hai aapko meri?
Customer: Hello. Awaz aa rahi hai madam bolo.
Executive: Ji, sir Ankita baat kar rahi thi IndiaMART se.
Customer: Sir number aapka save nahi hai.
Customer: Dusra number se call kiya. Boliye na.
Executive: Sir, ye mera recorded line number hai. Actually aapka kal Ziya sir se discussion hua tha. Ji.
Customer: Haan ji boliye.
Executive: To wo aapko call kar, haan wo aapko call kar rahe the but shayad aap occupied the to aapse baat nahi ho pai.
Customer: Nahi, call nahi aaya kisi ka bhi. Na na na koi call nahi aaya madam.
Executive: Ek minute. Just give me a moment, sir.
Customer: Call aata to.
Executive: Haan sir, just give me a moment. Ek minute, ek minute.
Customer: Koi nahi madam, chodiye boliye.
Executive: Sir, aap check karoge?
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi check kiya koi call nahi hai. Hota hai to main call back karta hu. Thik hai, koi baat nahi boliye na madam.
Executive: To main abhi agar aap available ho to aap abhi baat karoge? Main karwa du? Aapko discussion karna tha na? Wo pending tha actually aapka.
Customer: Nahi koi discuss nahi hai ye wo bole check karke main batata hu kya hai kidhar hai aise bolne lage.
Customer: To thik hai sir check karo wo karke bola main aur wo naam bhi abhi tak seedha nahi hua hai madam jo meri pehle ki query thi kaise ki waise hi hai. Maine unko bola tha wo kar diya unhone?
Executive: Sir, wo aap mujhe ek cheez batao na ab to aapke dono hi services mere yaha pe interrupt ho gaye hain. To abhi to wo query aap presence ka hi sara.
Executive: Sir, main aapse main aapka koi concern aaya tha. Nahi.
Customer: Nahi. Haan. Hmm boliye. Boliye boliye aap boliye.
Executive: Main madam ye bola hu ki sir dekho payment ho jayegi aaj ke aaj ho jayegi. But kya hai mera jo issue hai teen saal purana abhi tak solve nahi hua hai aap karao.
Customer: Aur main uska template bhi deta hu wo change karao. Fir main aapko payment kar deta hu. To bole thik hai main check kar raha hu itna hi bola unhone. Fir bole thik hai kal connect karte hai itna hi bola unhone. Fir uske baad hua nahi kuch bhi.
Customer: Itni baat hui thi.
Executive: Nahi unhone aapko 12 unhone sir dekhiye jo aap bata rahe ho company ka to company name ka to aapka hamara discussion hua tha yaha pe MS Global Earth jo update ho rakha hai. Wo aapka correction sir correction ke baad hi wo hua hai cheez. Pehle aapka sara small mein aa raha tha if you remember. Sara small mein aa raha tha aapne mujhe bola bhi ki mam ye mera renewal ka time ho gaya hai tab aapne ye kaam karwaya hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi fir bhi maine Shubham se baat kiya tha fir bhi ek ek ek capital mein hai baki sab small mein hi hai madam aap dekho to.
Executive: Sir, main bata deti hu aapko maine to khola hua hai catalog aapka. Fir sir se fir sir se baat hui to bole haan thik hai main check karta hu GST mein jo rahega wo hoga aise bola unhone.
Customer: To fir wo hua kya dekh lijiye thoda sa.
Executive: Nahi maine sir open kiya hua hai. Main aapko wahi bol rahi hu aapka MS capital hai Global ka G capital hai Earth ka E capital hai. Abhi kaha pe kya issue aa raha hai aap mere ko wo batao pehli cheez.
Customer: Sab capital mein hona chahiye.
Executive: Aap pura capital mein chah rahe ho?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Sir, wo to possible nahi hai kyuki jo last time maine karaya tha wo bhi team ke on request karaya tha. Yahi waha pe possible tha jo humne karwa diya tha. Aur Ziya sir ka aap jo unhone bhi try kiya hai but yahi ho pa raha hai uske baad bhi unhone aaj aapko 12 baje connect karne ke liye try kiya might be shayad koi network issue hoga ya aapko nahi aaya but unhone mere ko dikhaya unhone call kiya tha.
Customer: Thik hai koi baat nahi. Unko boliye 11:30 12 baje kal ek bar connect karne ke liye main batata hu unko baat karta hu. Thik hai. Ek hi baat 10 bar discuss karne ke liye matlab mere paas bhi time nahi hai madam. Unko boliye morning mein call karne ke liye unke sath discuss karta hu main. Agar wo nahi hi ho raha hai to mujhe karana hi nahi hai.
Executive: Nahi that's fine sir wo aapka call hai dekho wo to waise bhi aapka jo bhi date tha time tha wo nikal hi gaya. Uska koi wahi nahi hai wo call aap hi ka rahega waha koi issue nahi hai aisa. But aapne kyuki kal I think maine unko maine unko samjhaya hai yahi baat mujhe pehle bhi boli gayi thi jab small letter mein tha na jab bhi jo aapne bola na same to same usne bhi waise hi bola tha ki ye nahi hoga change. To tab ja ke aapne change karwaya usko. Karwaya to bhi wrong mein karwaya. Usko pura capital mein karna tha. Main kal suniye madam baat. Maine sir ne bola as per GST hoga to GST certificate maine unko diya hai. Agar as per GST aap kar rahe ho to main renewal karwa raha hu madam. As per GST nahi hoga to main renewal bilkul nahi karwaunga. Mujhe nahi chahiye meri company ka naam koi utpatang harkato se likhe apne dil mein jaise aaye waisa likhe main bilkul bardasht nahi karunga usko. Mera abhi tak query solve nahi hui hai. Unhone bola thik hai main karwa ke deta hu to isiliye unse meri baat chal rahi hai ek bar unse 11:30 12 baje call karwaiye agar mera phone nahi lagta hai to main whatsapp pe available hu mujhe call back ka boliye main call back kar leta hu koi baat nahi.
Executive: Thik hai. Wo to aap kar lete hain khair usme mujhe bhi pata hai wo aap kar lete hain. Maybe kuch reason se shayad raha hoga. Wo bhi busy honge shayad mera network issue hoga. Kuch na kuch network ka hi raha hoga otherwise call to unhone lagaya hai kyuki uske baad hi maine aapko lagaya ki maybe shayad aapke paas mera number hoga ya hamara baat hua hai to maybe aap utha lo isliye maine aapko dobara bhi connect kiya.
Customer: Madam aap apne number se phone lagate ho to utha hi leta hu main phone aapka.
Executive: Sir, main aapko bata du ye mera hi number hai ye mera recorded line number hai kyuki aapka ek concern raise hai. Aur wo jo mera number hai 9958931944 wo bhi mera hi number hai. Ye 1048132755 aap aap kabhi bhi call karoge ye mera hi official number hai. Mere paas hi lagega.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Thik hai? Baki mere ko aapse discussion ye tha ki aapka kal wo jo Archana ji se discussion hua tha wo jo conversation tha usko aapne rate kiya tha as not satisfied. I hope wo sara jo bhi haan wo bhi bata diya maine aapko wo bhi bata diya wo wo Ziya sir ko maine feedback diya hai.
Customer: Maine bola aapka bhi feedback diya hu aapka bhi feedback diya hu bole ki nahi wo aapke bare mein.
Executive: Nahi I think mera bhi kuch feedback kharab hi gaya hai sir jitna mujhe pata chala hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi nahi nahi recorded line hai na main aapka kharab feedback nahi diya hu madam. Recorded line pe bol raha hu aapka aur Shubham suniye aapka aur Shubham ka dono ka kharab feedback nahi diya hu positive mein hi bola hu main aapke bare mein aur Shubham ke bare mein bhi maine positive hi bola hai aap puch lijiye unse. Maine bola Archana sir I think 31st main batati hu aapko 31st of October ko aapko aapka evening mein shayad sir ko call gaya hai ya aaya hai I don't remember exactly gaya hai ya aaya hai but us din shayad aapki jo bhi conversation hui thi that was a very heat up discussion kuch aapka feedback tha jo Shubham aur mere dono ke liye hi shayad sahi feedback nahi tha.
Customer: Wo Shubham ke liye tha wo mare ja raha tha bechara main main text bol raha hu main kahi aaya hu bhai bahut urgent kaam ke liye koi bimar hai koi mar raha hai aap text mat karo main aapko call back karta hu morning mein to wo dusre dusre number se mujhe call karne laga to maine bola ki bhai ye mar raha hai isko mere paise se hi leke pani pi ke marna hai kya maine yahi alfaaz usko bola aur aapke bare mein mein nahi bola kyuki aapne ek hi bar call kiya ek hi bar text kiya aapne. Aapne bar bar nahi kiya to main aapke bare mein kyu bolunga mere paas kuch bolne ke liye proof to chahiye na aapke khilaf. Uske paas tha wo main bol raha hu usko.
Executive: Chalo sir koi baat nahi koi koi koi baat nahi sir jo bhi raha just maine aapka feedback kharab nahi diya hai Shubham ka us time ke liye bola tha kyuki wo mare ja rahe the phone laga rahe the isiliye wo bola lekin wo aadmi achcha hai yahi maine bola aur aapke liye bhi bola hai maine ke bahut achcha unhone humse baat ki bahut achcha unhone ye kiya yahi bola main. Archana ka isiliye bola kyuki wo bahut hi matlab wo rude behavior se wo baat kar rahi thi aur bola aapke manager ko de do to bolti hai main senior manager hu. Kyuki rate bhi usne itna matlab 2 lakh 2.5 lakh ka bata diya tha mujhe aur hi frustration ho gaya main bola madam aap thoda koi senior se connect kar de to bolti hai unhone star ke sath bataya hoga aapka star ka bhi pending tha kyuki wo alag department rehta hai unko utna clarity nahi hai jab services aap renew nahi karate hain. Wo gunda type department hi hai aapka jo recovery department hai wo insurance mein jo log hote hai na wahi logo ko bitha ke rakha hai ye bhi bol diya maine unko. Star ka nahi maximizer ki baat ab to itne aapke ka naam.
Executive: Thik hai to main abhi isko main thoda summarize karti hu.
Executive: Haan hmm boliye boliye. Main ye keh rahi hu sir ki jo aapne Archana ki call ko rate kiya tha na uska ek hamare paas feedback aaya tha aur us feedback ke bihaf pe Ziya ji ne hi call lagaya ya aapne mujhe request kiya tha ki aapko unse baat karna hai right uske bihaf pe wo discussion ho gayi hai thik hai abhi waha pe kuch aur required hai.
Customer: Madam Archana ke manager se aapko baat karna hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi nahi nahi itna senior hu mere se hi baat karo.
Executive: Sir Archana main aapko bata deti hu aapka jo service ka jo bhi renewal hona tha wo October month ke andar hi hona tha humne hold wold karwa rakha tha wo jaise hi aap renew nahi karwai wo ek dusre department mein rehta hai thik hai wo aapko.
Customer: Pata hai pata hai wo dekhiye haan ji madam haan ji.
Customer: Kal na aap sir se baat karwa do ek bar main renewal kar deta hu thik hai.
Executive: Koi problem nahi hai sir abhi at present main wo call ke liye unhe bol deti hu thik hai wo aapko ek bar connect kar lenge. Other than that ye jo aapne Archana ji haan haan sure sure sure sir main kal ke liye hi bola hai kal main 11 12 baje karwa deti hu baki ye jo aapne Archana ki call ko rate kiya tha na ye wala jo concern raise tha ye main aapka close kar rahi hu uska feedback jayega please wo feedback aap sahi de dijiyega thik hai kyuki wo aapka hum jo bhi address karna tha wo humne kar diya hai to uska dobara feedback aayega aapke paas thik hai.
Customer: Ye aapke call ke liye rahega kya Archana ke liye rahega?
Executive: Ye meri call ke liye rahega aap aur hum baat kar rahe hain final to wo meri call ke liye rahega feedback. Aapke paas likh kar aayega ki aapki inse baat hui hai.
Customer: Haan mera naam likh kar aayega sir don't worry bilkul bilkul mera naam likh kar aayega.
Executive: Thik hai madam koi baat nahi sir okay sir okay thank you thank you so much thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's company name not displaying correctly.

- Customer states issue not resolved for 3 years.

- Wants to speak with a senior executive.

- Expresses frustration with rude behavior of Archana.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed the company name format.

- Executive assured to connect with Ziya sir.

- Executive assured to close the Archana call rating.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect customer with Ziya sir.

- Customer will receive a feedback form.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- company name, gst, renewal, feedback, call connection
